# Function sum

Compute the sum of a list of values
In case of a (multi dimensional) array or matrix, the sum of all
elements will be calculated.

    sum(a, b, c, ...)
    sum(A)


### Parameters

Parameter | Type | Description
--------- | ---- | -----------
`args` | ... * | A single matrix or or multiple scalar values

### Returns

Type | Description
---- | -----------
* | res
